description: A mobile app that helps fitting engineers log garment amendments on the fly, streamlining the quality control process.
main_content:
The Burberry Fitting Engineer App was developed to revolutionize how fitting engineers document and track garment amendments. The app allows engineers to capture detailed measurements, take photos, and log amendments in real-time, significantly reducing the time spent on paperwork and improving accuracy.

Key challenges included ensuring offline functionality for factory environments with limited connectivity, implementing a robust image capture system, and creating an intuitive interface for quick data entry. The solution resulted in a 60% reduction in documentation time and a 40% decrease in errors.

process.discovery: Conducted extensive user research with fitting engineers to understand their workflow and pain points
process.design: Created wireframes and prototypes focusing on quick data entry and offline functionality
process.development: Built a hybrid mobile app using Ionic and Angular, with a Node.js backend
process.testing: Implemented comprehensive testing across various devices and network conditions
process.deployment: Rolled out the app to all Burberry manufacturing facilities with training sessions

testimonial.quote: The app has transformed how our fitting engineers work, making the process more efficient and accurate.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson
